entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
